name: "Project Nerd Power" Pocket Protector Set {#281}
description:
Fashionerds know that pocket protectors aren't just about keeping the ink off your shirt. Celebrate your inner nerd with this hip personalized pocket protector set!

This set includes a hand-sewn pocket protector from Anne B. Vinyl, personalized letterpress-printed index cards from Inkello®, and a groovy Fisher Space Pen (the kind astronauts use to write in zero gravity!).

Lo-tech index cards are a simple, chic way to organize your life. What better place to stash them than in this interpretation of the classic pocket protector? Attractively packaged, this makes a perfect gift set for Dad, your uncle who works at NASA, or that new hottie in I.T. (is that you?). Additional personalized index cards are available here.

Personalization

Please read this page about personalized items before checking out. You will be asked to enter the information for personalization, and font and ink color choices after clicking "Checkout" from your shopping cart. Please allow 4 to 5 business days for your personalized order to be handprinted in letterpress. Custom-printed items are non-returnable.

Detailed Description

Set includes: 1 pocket protector, 50 personalized index cards, 1 pen, packaged together in a clear plastic box accented with coordinating Japanese washi paper masking tape and Anne B. / Inkello® labels, letterpress-printed on sparkly metallic paper.

Pocket protector: cut from sparkle vinyl and oilcloth, hand-sewn with sturdy polyester thread, finished with rounded corners, fully lined/backed so it looks great from any angle, Anne B. label sewn to back. (Please note that there may be some subtle variations in the pattern placement of the patterned oilcloth on each style of pocket protector, due to the nature of handmade items. However, the overall "look" of each will not be compromised. For example, in the pocket protectors with the skull pattern, there will always be a skull on the front flap, but it may shift a bit from left to right depending on how the oilcloth is cut.)

Index cards: white, smooth, uncoated 80 lb. cover paper with rounded corners, your name handset in vintage metal type and printed by letterpress in your choice of font and ink color at the top of each card; back of each card is blank; stack of cards is wrapped with a paper band.

Index card font choices:

Index card ink color choices:

Pen: coordinating refillable Fisher Space Cap-o-Matic S200 Pen.

Sizes: Pocket protector: 3-3/4" x 6" x 1/8"; index card: 3" x 5", stack of 50 cards is 1/2" thick; pen: 5-3/8" in length; boxed set: 4-3/8" x 6-1/8" x 5/8".

name: Swirly Personalized Notecards {#192}
description:
Twelve personalized notecards on your choice of three luxurious duplex papers. Your name is set by hand using vintage metal type and handprinted on an antique letterpress.

Duplex means that the paper is actually two sheets fused together, so it's one color on the front, and an entirely different color on the other side. The cards are folded short, so the color from the inside shows along the right edge when the card is closed.

The envelopes are printed with a matching design. Packaged in a clear plastic box and tied with a smart black grosgrain ribbon.

name: Sash-in-Style Bottle Labels {#327}
description:
Re-style your empty glass bottles with this set of four innovative label sashes printed in silkscreen. Made with durable and reusable black chalkcloth, colorful ultrasuede, and contrasting grosgrain ribbons, each can dress up nearly any bottle.

Use the included chalk pencil to label the bottle's contents. Perfect for easygoing, eco-chic outdoor picnics and patio parties! Pair the bright colors to different bottle or carafes of water, lemonade or grown-up drinks on your buffet or give each table its own fun numbered bottle.

When the party is over, it's easy to wipe the labels clean with a lightly dampened cloth, slip the sashes off, and save everything for your next soirée.

{Another creative collaboration from Inkello® and Anne B. Vinyl}
